Text: The Dark Heroine:  The first novel in the series, "Dinner with a Vampire," revolves around London-born Violet Lee, who is kidnapped and held hostage by a Royal Family of vampires known as the Varns.
Triplets:<The Dark Heroine

Text: The Dark Heroine:  The series is told from both Violet Lee and Kaspar Varn's perspective, the latter being heir to the Vamperic Throne in the novel.
Triplets:<The Dark Heroine
